Text:
Wondeful! Watched it during the mid-80s, and I really envied the guy who had that cool computer in the series. 
Thanks for the upload, much apriciated!
Yes, I would love it too!
PLEASE reseed this. I will be eternally greatfull (well, at least for a very long time)

At the time I'm writing this, there are no seeders for this torrent, but several leechers with 99.9% completion.

If you download the 99.9%, all you will have lost is the mp3 file containing the theme song.

BUT - The first episode will be corrupt and unplayable. Because it's the beginning (file header ) that is missing, most file fixing programs can't fix it. But this one can:

http://www.repairvideo.com/

Hope this helps...
this 99% thing is annoying, while fixable still needs a new torrent.
